title: [Lunule Weald, Knoll]
description: Several stone steps have been carved into the hillside and would be useful, if they were not inverted.  Large rock formations atop the hill block out the moonlight, deepening the shadows.  A strange whistling sound pierces the silence.

Several stone steps have been carved into the hillside and would be useful, if they were not inverted.  Large rock formations atop the hill block out the sun, deepening the shadows.  A strange whistling sound pierces the silence.
